Source code


  2. #include "cspec/output_unit.h"
  3. #include <stdio.h>


  6. typedef struct {

  8.     CSpecOutputStruct output;

  10.     int nbPassed;
  11.     int nbTotal;

  13. ‌} CSpecOutputUnitStruct;


  16. ‌static CSpecOutputUnitStruct unit;


  19. void
  20. ‌startDescribeFunUnit(const char *descr)
  21. {
  22.     printf("Unit testing: %s\n", descr);
  23.     unit.nbPassed = 0;
  24.     unit.nbTotal  = 0;
  25. }


  28. void
  29. ‌endDescribeFunUnit()
  30. {
  31.     if (unit.nbPassed == unit.nbTotal) {
  32.         printf("\n\tAll tests Passed (%d)\n\n", unit.nbTotal);

  34.     } else {
  35.         printf("\n\tPassed %d tests out of %d\n\n", unit.nbPassed,
  36.                unit.nbTotal);
  37.     }
  38. }


  41. void
  42. ‌evalFunUnit(const char *filename, int line_number, const char *assertion,
  43.     int assertionResult)
  44. {
  45.     unit.nbTotal++;
  46.     if (assertionResult) {
  47.         unit.nbPassed++;

  49.     } else {
  50.         printf("\t:::Failed:::\t%s\n\t%s(%d)\n", assertion, filename, line_number);
  51.     }
  52. }


  55. CSpecOutputStruct *
  56. ‌CSpec_NewOutputUnit()
  57. {
  58.     CSpec_InitOutput(&(unit.output));

  60.     unit.output.startDescribeFun = startDescribeFunUnit;
  61.     unit.output.endDescribeFun   = endDescribeFunUnit;
  62.     unit.output.startItFun       = 0;
  63.     unit.output.endItFun         = 0;
  64.     unit.output.evalFun          = evalFunUnit;
  65.     unit.output.pendingFun       = 0;

  67.     return &(unit.output);
  68. }
